Verify the 'Download Report' button has text color #ffffff, background color #17a2b8, font weight 600, 10px top and bottom padding, and 20px left and right padding

Verify clicking initiates a file download from 'https://example.com/report.pdf'

Verify inactive thumbnails have opacity 0.7
